findings.message: Missing sender validation on internal_transfer handler. Any contract can invoke this message, potentially minting tokens without authorization.
findings.suggestion: Add throw_unless(73, equal_slices(sender_address, my_address())) to verify the message originates from the expected wallet contract.

findings.message: No bounce handler for outgoing token transfer. If the destination contract rejects the message, tokens will be lost.
findings.suggestion: Implement a recv_bounced handler that restores the sender's balance on failed transfers.

findings.message: Gas forwarding amount is hardcoded. May be insufficient for complex receiver contracts or fail under network congestion.
findings.suggestion: Use msg_value - gas_consumption instead of a fixed value to forward remaining gas.

findings.message: Contract does not implement optional TEP-74 get_jetton_data metadata extension. Consider adding for better wallet/explorer discoverability.
findings.suggestion: Add a get_jetton_data() get-method returning (total_supply, mintable, admin_address, content, wallet_code).
